attributes.title: BOGUS APP 🚫🚫🚫
attributes.review: This app DESTROYED my phone. Firstly it took over 36 hours to download, and in the process drained my battery so that now my phone won’t even fully charge. The app corrupted all of my contacts, and deleted many of my apps, like TikTok. Also the protagonist of this app, DJ Trump, is a misogynist, rapist, sexual predator, tax evader, liar, child endangerer, family separator, and a fool... which I’m pretty sure goes against Apples terms of use?

attributes.title: Do not get 👨🏻‍🦳
attributes.review: Not only did this take the entire four years to download, but in was reading the privacy policy and saw that when you agree to the terms and conditions, trump actually has permission from the law enforcement to not just punch, but to karate chop, kick, and sit on our dearest grandmothers. For the safety of all of our elderly companions, let’s fight back and please do not download. ❤️❤️❤️

attributes.title: BAD
attributes.review: this is the worst app i’ve ever seen in my entire life. i had to download it and right after i did it gave me hives. i would not recommend this app to anyone and if you do like it... jail. ❤️ please never download this app✨ it’s so dumb ❤️ and there’s this guy who looks like an orange on my screen and i HATE IT 😔😔😔 get him off! gross anyways .... stream fine line by harry styles and walls by louis William tomlinson 🤪✨💅🏻

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Not only did this app take HOURS to download, but there were ads every time I pressed a button, and only in-app purchases. Also, the app design is bad, and whoever’s face is on the app wasnt the best model to use 🤭. Please reconsider starting over the whole app from scratch, actually just do us a favor and delete the app forever please. Thank you for reading this <3

attributes.title: If you get this you’re gonna regret it
attributes.review: Hi when I downloaded this app I was first confused because I had no idea why a orange with a croissant on top of its head until a strange women who I think her name was Karen and she screamed at me telling me that it’s the president so I downloaded it because I would rather have the predator hunt me down with his thermo gear than deal with the real life president that’s 100x worst 🍊🍊🍊🍊

attributes.title: Beware the app is haunted!!!!!!
attributes.review: The app is haunted! Right after I downloaded it I started to heard things falling from my kitchen. I thought nothing of it at first but other weird events occurred. Something truly terrifying was the dream I had the night I downloaded it, it was an orange Cheeto puff who jumped out of the Cheetos bag and chased after me telling to vote for him! You have been warned, download at your own risk!!!🤭🤭

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to show my appreciation to our loving and great president. first of all it took 17 hours just to DOWNLOAD and then when i opened it up, i don’t know if this is just a bug or something but it showed inappropriate ads. my child, makenediegh, saw the inappropriate ads as well. DISGUSTING!!! you have lost a long time fan and j will no longer be voting for you😩 -karen johnson

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: first of all, this app took 48 hours to download, which was very frustrating. then when it asked for my phone number, i gladly put it in because i wanted to support little old bunker boy 🥺🥺 but then the next thing i know i get these messages saying to look out your window and there was this big old fat orange boy staring at me. i then realized it was our president. i walked outside to say hi to him and that he’s the worst president ever, but then he let loose 800 rats into my house which are my my clothes, furniture, and my dog. i have to live with the ptsd for the rest of my life. if i could give the app a zero stars, i would.

attributes.title: Absolutely Horrible Please Beware
attributes.review: This app not only took forever to download, but I’m pretty sure it has bugs. It shuts randomly and functions horribly 😡😡😡 I also think it is stealing my personal information !!! I will no longer be supporting this app or this campaign. I am disgusted! Please someone take this monster down before it eats anymore childrens lives !!!

attributes.title: THIS APP IS A SCAM
attributes.review: When i first downloaded this app i really wanted to support my great and incredible president. However, when I opened the app it asked me for my credit card number so that i could pay the monthly fee of 100 dollars. Now as a broke boomer, i do not have 100 spare dollars a month. So i clicked out of the fee and then the app started swearing at me. Very loudly. My poor grandchildren!
